project_abstract.cdata: The project is designed to promote economic growth and alleviate poverty in an impoverished region. The project will help address major infrastructure and resource constraints faced by Hainan province. The project includes two main categories of components, power and agriculture/resettlement. The main power components comprise: (a) construction of a gravity dam of roller compacted concrete; (b) construction of an underground powerhouse, equipped with four 60MW generators; (c) erection of 36km of 220kV transmission lines; (d) installation of a computerized load dispatch system; and (e) technical assistance and training in project design, power system planning and tariff studies. The major agriculture/resettlement components comprise: (a) construction of a 16km long High Main Canal; (b) resettlement of 23,800 people in Dongfang and Ledong counties; (c) provision of agricultural support and environmental management services; and (d) technical assistance for the preparation of the agricultural development plan.

P003492.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>大广坝水利水电项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的目标是促进海南省贫困地区的经济增长和扶贫工作。本项目将协助克服海南省面临的基础设施和资源两大制约因素。本项目设有两大子项目，即电力和农业/移民安置子项目。电力子项目的具体内容包括：（1）兴建碾压混凝土重力坝；（2）兴建装有四台60兆瓦发电机组的地下厂房；（3）架设36公里220千伏输电线；（4）安装计算机负荷调度系统；（5）就项目设计、电力系统规划以及电费研究提供技术援助和培训。农业/移民安置子项目的具体内容包括：（1）修建16公里干渠；（2）安置东方和乐东两县的2.38万移民；（3）提供农业支持和环境管理服务；（4）就农业发展规划编制工作提供技术援助。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
